name: SonarQubePostTest
description: Finish the analysis and upload the results to SonarQube
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: breakBuild
inputs.label: Break the build on quality gate failure (SQ 5.3+)
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is only available when using a SonarQube server 5.3 or above. It will introduce delays as the build must wait for SonarQube to complete the analysis. [More information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=722407)

instanceNameFormat: Finish the analysis and upload the results to SonarQube
